bibdata.title: Standard General Requirements for Dry-Type Distribution and Power Transformers Including Those with Solid Cast and/or Resin Encapsulated Windings
Standard General Requirements for Dry-Type Distribution and Power Transformers Including Those with Solid Cast and/or Resin Encapsulated Windings
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.01-2005 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.01-1998)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Electrical, mechanical, and safety requirements of ventilated, non-ventilated, and sealed dry-type distribuion and power transformers or auto transformers (single and polyphase, with a voltage of 601 V or higher in the highest voltage winding) are described.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.12.01-2015 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.01-2005)
